title: Bug 123044 - Page Break Issue in PDF Preview
description: Description: Preview attached file in PDF, and the page break in the first item didn't happen.
OB: When previewing the attached file in PDF format, the expected page break in the first item did not occur.
EB: The first item in the PDF preview should have a page break as per the expected formatting.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the attached file in bug 1228982 and preview it in PDF format.
